ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Passive Birthsigns
ModMetaData.author: ESCP
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in a passive set of Morrowind inspired birth signs using the ESCP Birthsign framework. There's are designed to seamlessly fit into RimWorld.

While Royalty and Ideology are listed as requirements, this mod will work without them. However, certain birthsigns will not give their bonuses.

-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
